explanations.machine learning: The paper mentions the use of machine learning models, including support vector machines and neural networks, to assess predictive performance.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper explicitly states the use of support vector machines as one of the machine learning models applied in the study.
explanations.SVM: SVM is an abbreviation for support vector machine, which is mentioned in the paper as one of the applied machine learning models.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions the use of neural networks as part of the machine learning models used to evaluate the predictive performance of smoothed financial risk tolerance data.
